name: Giant Four-Armed Gargoyle
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons

traits.False Appearance: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

actions.Multiattack: The gargoyle makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d8 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.Claw: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d8 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.
